channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NC
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NC

item.title: Report X-2024010664
item.description:
Report X-2024010664

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-01T15:11:51+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-02
  • City: CONCORD
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: WE WERE CALLED TO THE IC2 BELT BY THE IC BELT MANAGER BECAUSE OF A LEAKING HAZMAT PACKAGE. UPON INSPECTION WE DISCOVERED THAT ONE OF THE FOUR BOTTLES WAS LEAKING AND IT LEAKED ALL OUT IN THE BOX CONTAMINATING THE ENTIRE BOX. WE PUT THE PACKAGE IN A LINED HAZMAT TOTE AND ISOLATED THIS IN THE HAZMAT CAGE. DescribePack: ONE LOOSE CAP DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: WE PUT THE PACKAGE IN A LINED HAZMAT TOTE AND ISOLATED THIS IN THE HAZMAT CAGE.

item.title: Report X-2024010647

Report X-2024010647
